title: Hidden Cats in Tokyo
description: A great danger is turning Tokyo’s cats into monsters! Let’s vaccinate and cure them before the situation gets worse Hidden Cats in Tokyo is a hidden object adventure game, where you need to find all the cats in Tokyo and vaccinate them before they turn into dangerous monsters and destroy the city. There are over 1400 cats to find, and almost 1750 total hidden objects. Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
